definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Le 11:5 rock-badger, hyrax syriacus, AV RV coney;—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: De 14:7 = Le 11:5 (P; unclean animal); living in rocks, pl. [[שְׁפַנִּים]] Ps 104:18, Pr 30:26.—Vid. Rob:BR iii. 66, 387 Tr:NHB 75; FFP 1, and Pl. 1 Post:Hast. DB CONEY McLean-Shipley:Ency. Blb. ID.
